column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////When you enter you have to go through a zig zag line to get to the counter where they have the menus out somewhere. Then you're supposed to tell the person behind the counter what you want
column2: which is kind of difficult because the pastries are way at the end of the counter where you pay and they're not listed on the menu. I also came in too early once and they hadn't put the pastries out yet. From my experience the pastries came out around 10:30am-11am. I heard that the pastries were gone by 2pm because of how popular this place is
column3: but I don't know if that's true. I think the latest I ever got pastry was around 1pm and the selection was still good.
